description:
Raika`s been asked to make a promotional poster for the school, and has decided to follow Takuto more than usual in hopes of getting a truly ugly picture.  Takuto is caught up in all kinds of erotic trouble she causes, and is desperate to find a way out.  Things get out of control fast, and start going in a direction neither of them expected.  When Takuto`s fantasies are unleashed at last, a dazzling turnabout begins!
Source: crunchyroll
